articles.description: Huawei’s new flagship Mate 50 series will offer texting in areas without wireless signal thanks to China’s BeiDou satellite network. The phones also feature 6.7-inch screens and 50-megapixel main cameras with variable aperture lenses.
articles.content:
Your move, Apple
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.
The Huawei Mate 50 might have just edged out Apple in the space-texting race.

articles.author: Tobias Mann
articles.title: SiFive RISC-V CPU cores to power NASA's next spaceflight computer - The Register
articles.description: After more than two decades, the space agency's PowerPC love affair appears to be at an end
articles.content:
Chip designer SiFive said Tuesday its RISC-V-compatible CPU cores will power NASAs just-announced High-Performance Spaceflight Computer (HPSC).
The computer system will form the backbone for future … [+4614 chars]
